name: Pixel Marauder: Revenge of Captain Sea Wolf
name_original: Pixel Marauder: Revenge of Captain Sea Wolf
description:
Hello and Welcome to Pixel Marauders: Revenge of Captain Sea Wolf! You've recently betrayed you former pirate captain and now he's out of your blood. What will you do?

Objective: Survive through 5 waves of Captain Sea Wolf's allies to win! 

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys to move around

Use SpaceBar to shoot

**Note: Game is currently under construction. This is a prototype so there may be bugs or other issues.
